annotations.description: Configmap template for the reminder job. This template may not include real value of secrets; you need to manually replace the value in Openshift.

parameters.name: NAME
parameters.description: The name assigned to all of the OpenShift resources associated to the server instance.

parameters.name: APP_GROUP
parameters.description: The name assigned to all of the deployments in this project.

parameters.name: TAG_NAME
parameters.description: The TAG name for this environment, e.g., dev, test, prod

parameters.name: REMINDER_ENDPOINT
parameters.description: Endpoint to invoke to send reminders.

parameters.name: SERVICE_ACCOUNT_ID
parameters.description: Service account id in oidc provider to invoke the job. This service account must have reminder_job role.

parameters.name: SERVICE_ACCOUNT_SECRET
parameters.description: Service account secret for service account in oidc provider to invoke the job.

parameters.name: MAIL_FROM_ID
parameters.description: Mail from address to appear on emails

parameters.name: EMAIL_APPOINTMENT_APP_URL
parameters.description: Appointment Url to provide in email

parameters.name: MAX_EMAIL_PER_BATCH
parameters.description: Maximum emails which can be sent in a minute
